languages.text: {n}Отряд аколитов Инквизиции тайно реквизировал оскверненную машину. Спустя короткое время на Даргонус стали поступать очень любопытные анонимные предупреждения, каждое из которых, несомненно, было оплачено кровью и душой самоотверженного защитника Империума.{/n}

{n}The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes secretly requisitioned the corrupted machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings began to arrive on Dargonus, and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of a selfless defender of the Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Отряд аколитов Инквизиции тайно реквизировал оскверненную машину. Спустя короткое время на Даргонус стали поступать очень любопытные анонимные предупреждения, каждое из которых, несомненно, было оплачено кровью и душой самоотверженного защитника Империума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes had secretly requisitioned the desecrated machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings have started to arrive on Dargonus,and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of the selfless defender of the Imperium.{n}

{n}The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes secretly requisitioned the corrupted machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings began to arrive on Dargonus, and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of a selfless defender of the Imperium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}审判庭的侍仆秘密征用了这台被腐化的机器。一段时间过后，某些古怪的匿名警告陆续传到了达戈努斯。毫无疑问，每条警告都是无私的帝国守护者用自己的鲜血和灵魂换来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes secretly requisitioned the corrupted machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings began to arrive on Dargonus, and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of a selfless defender of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}审判庭的侍仆秘密征用了这台被腐化的机器。一段时间过后，某些古怪的匿名警告陆续传到了达戈努斯。毫无疑问，每条警告都是无私的帝国守护者用自己的鲜血和灵魂换来的。{/n}
{n}审判庭的侍仆秘密征用了这台被亵渎的机器。一段时间过后，某些古怪的匿名警告陆续传到了达戈努斯。毫无疑问，每条警告都是无私的帝国守护者用自己的鲜血和灵魂换来的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El escuadrón de acólitos de la Inquisición requisó en secreto la máquina corrupta. Al poco tiempo, empezaron a llegar a Dargonus unas advertencias anónimas muy peculiares, cada una de ellas pagada sin duda con la sangre y el alma de un valeroso defensor del Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes secretly requisitioned the corrupted machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings began to arrive on Dargonus, and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of a selfless defender of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El escuadrón de acólitos de la Inquisición requisó en secreto la máquina corrupta. Al poco tiempo, empezaron a llegar a Dargonus unas advertencias anónimas muy peculiares, cada una de ellas pagada sin duda con la sangre y el alma de un valeroso defensor del Imperium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異端審問庁のアコライト部隊は、汚された機械を密かに徴用した。しばらくすると、ダルゴナスに匿名の警告が届き始めた。そのひとつひとつが、帝国の無私無欲の擁護者の血と魂により支払われたものであることは間違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes secretly requisitioned the corrupted machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings began to arrive on Dargonus, and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of a selfless defender of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 異端審問庁のアコライト部隊は、冒涜された機械を密かに徴用した。しばらくすると、ダルゴナスに匿名の警告が届き始めた。そのひとつひとつが、帝国の無私無欲の擁護者の血と魂により支払われたものであることは間違いない。{n}
{n}異端審問庁のアコライト部隊は、冒涜された機械を密かに徴用した。しばらくすると、ダルゴナスに匿名の警告が届き始めた。そのひとつひとつが、帝国の無私無欲の擁護者の血と魂により支払われたものであることは間違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'escouade des acolytes de l'Inquisition réquisitionne la machine corrompue en secret. Après quelque temps, Dargonus se met à recevoir d'étranges avertissements anonymes, et il ne fait aucun doute que chacun d'entre eux a exigé le courageux sacrifice d'une sentinelle de l'Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes secretly requisitioned the corrupted machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings began to arrive on Dargonus, and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of a selfless defender of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'escouade des acolytes de l'Inquisition réquisitionne la machine corrompue en secret. Après quelque temps, Dargonus se met à recevoir d'étranges avertissements anonymes, et il ne fait aucun doute que chacun d'entre eux a exigé le courageux sacrifice d'une sentinelle de l'Imperium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Trupp der Inquisitionsakolythen requirierte die verderbte Maschine heimlich. Nach kurzer Zeit trafen auf Dargonus merkwürdige anonyme Warnungen ein, von denen jede einzelne ohne Zweifel mit dem Blut und der Seele eines selbstlosen Verteidigers des Imperiums bezahlt worden war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes secretly requisitioned the corrupted machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings began to arrive on Dargonus, and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of a selfless defender of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Trupp der Inquisitionsakolythen requirierte die verderbte Maschine heimlich. Nach kurzer Zeit trafen auf Dargonus merkwürdige anonyme Warnungen ein, von denen jede einzelne ohne Zweifel mit dem Blut und der Seele eines selbstlosen Verteidigers des Imperiums bezahlt worden war.{/n}

{n}Der Trupp der Inquisitions-Akolythen requirierte die entweihte Maschine heimlich. Nach kurzer Zeit begannen in Dargonus merkwürdige anonyme Warnungen einzutreffen, von denen jede einzelne ohne Zweifel mit dem Blut und der Seele eines selbstlosen Verteidigers des Imperiums bezahlt worden war.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Engizisyon havarilerinden oluşan bir manga, yozlaşmış makineye gizlice el koydu. Kısa süre sonra meçhul şahıslar, Dargonus'a birtakım ilginç uyarılar iletmeye başladı. Şüphesiz ki İmparatorluk'un serdengeçtileri, bu uyarıların her birine can ve kanlarını feda etmiştir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The squad of the Inquisition's acolytes secretly requisitioned the corrupted machine. After a short while, some rather curious anonymous warnings began to arrive on Dargonus, and each of them had undoubtedly been paid for with the blood and soul of a selfless defender of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Engizisyon havarilerinden oluşan bir manga, yozlaşmış makineye gizlice el koydu. Kısa süre sonra meçhul şahıslar, Dargonus'a birtakım ilginç uyarılar iletmeye başladı. Şüphesiz ki İmparatorluk'un serdengeçtileri, bu uyarıların her birine can ve kanlarını feda etmiştir.{/n}
